io.github.jdiemke.triangulation

Class TriangleSoup

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.jdiemke.triangulation.TriangleSoup

  • public class TriangleSoup
extends java.lang.Object
    Triangle soup class implementation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TriangleSoup()
      Constructor of the triangle soup class used to create a new triangle soup instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Triangle2D triangle)
      Adds a triangle to this triangle soup.
      Triangle2D findContainingTriangle(Vector2D point)
      Returns the triangle from this triangle soup that contains the specified point or null if no triangle from the triangle soup contains the point.
      Edge2D findNearestEdge(Vector2D point)
      Returns the edge from the triangle soup nearest to the specified point.
      Triangle2D findNeighbour(Triangle2D triangle, Edge2D edge)
      Returns the neighbor triangle of the specified triangle sharing the same edge as specified.
      Triangle2D findOneTriangleSharing(Edge2D edge)
      Returns one of the possible triangles sharing the specified edge.
      java.util.List<Triangle2D> getTriangles()
      Returns the triangles from this triangle soup.
      void remove(Triangle2D triangle)
      Removes a triangle from this triangle soup.
      void removeTrianglesUsing(Vector2D vertex)
      Removes all triangles from this triangle soup that contain the specified vertex.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • add

        public void add(Triangle2D triangle)
        Adds a triangle to this triangle soup.
        Parameters:
        triangle - The triangle to be added to this triangle soup

      • remove

        public void remove(Triangle2D triangle)
        Removes a triangle from this triangle soup.
        Parameters:
        triangle - The triangle to be removed from this triangle soup

      • getTriangles

        public java.util.List<Triangle2D> getTriangles()
        Returns the triangles from this triangle soup.
        Returns:
        The triangles from this triangle soup

      • findContainingTriangle

        public Triangle2D findContainingTriangle(Vector2D point)
        Returns the triangle from this triangle soup that contains the specified point or null if no triangle from the triangle soup contains the point.
        Parameters:
        point - The point
        Returns:
        Returns the triangle from this triangle soup that contains the specified point or null

      • findNeighbour

        public Triangle2D findNeighbour(Triangle2D triangle,
                                Edge2D edge)
        Returns the neighbor triangle of the specified triangle sharing the same edge as specified. If no neighbor sharing the same edge exists null is returned.
        Parameters:
        triangle - The triangle
        edge - The edge
        Returns:
        The triangles neighbor triangle sharing the same edge or null if no triangle exists

      • findOneTriangleSharing

        public Triangle2D findOneTriangleSharing(Edge2D edge)
        Returns one of the possible triangles sharing the specified edge. Based on the ordering of the triangles in this triangle soup the returned triangle may differ. To find the other triangle that shares this edge use the findNeighbour(Triangle2D triangle, Edge2D edge) method.
        Parameters:
        edge - The edge
        Returns:
        Returns one triangle that shares the specified edge

      • findNearestEdge

        public Edge2D findNearestEdge(Vector2D point)
        Returns the edge from the triangle soup nearest to the specified point.
        Parameters:
        point - The point
        Returns:
        The edge from the triangle soup nearest to the specified point

      • removeTrianglesUsing

        public void removeTrianglesUsing(Vector2D vertex)
        Removes all triangles from this triangle soup that contain the specified vertex.
        Parameters:
        vertex - The vertex
